lanCN.closeServerContent:
Dear @Survivors,

Last Home's playtest is coming to an end, and we will briefly bid farewell to this unforgettable journey at 05:00  (UTC) 08/30. All data will be deleted. Thank you for your enthusiastic participation during this period of time!

Your valuable feedback will help us improve and refine the game experience, and we look forward to seeing you again in Last Home's subsequent tests and updates!

Stay tuned to our Discord channel for the latest news and game updates.

Thank you again for your support and participation!

The Last Home Game Team
lanCN.forceUpdate: 发现新版本，请前往商店下载
lanCN.maintenanceContent:
Dear Survivors,

We have just completed the server stability testing for the game. To ensure your gaming experience, the game will undergo server optimization and data wipe.

The official playtest will begin on July 15th at 03:30 (UTC). During the server downtime, feel free to click on the button to interact with us in the Discord community.

The Last Home Game Team

lanTW.maintenanceContent:
尊敬的首領：
為了保證您的遊戲體驗，我們正在進行停服優化，結束後我們將為您送上停服補償。
給您帶來的不變我們深表歉意，感謝您的理解和支持！
在停服等待過程中，點擊右下的按鈕，來社區和我們互動吧~
